Class ActionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.gouv.vitam.worker.core.handler.ActionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkerAction
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccessionRegisterActionHandler, CheckConformityActionHandler, CheckObjectsNumberActionHandler, CheckObjectUnitConsistencyActionHandler, CheckSedaActionHandler, CheckStorageAvailabilityActionHandler, CheckVersionActionHandler, DummyHandler, ExtractSedaActionHandler, FormatIdentificationActionHandler, IndexObjectGroupActionHandler, IndexUnitActionHandler, StoreObjectGroupActionHandler, TransferNotificationActionHandler, UnitsRulesComputeHandler

    public abstract class ActionHandler
extends Object
implements WorkerAction
    ActionHandler abstract class of interface Action

    Each ActionHandler must implements some public static methods:
     
    // Return the unique Id of this Handler
    public static final String getId();
    // Later on (not available now), some other methods for Input/Output arguments
